holidays.title: National Chocolate Chip Day
holidays.description: Legend has it that the chocolate chip cookie was a happy accident.

holidays.title: Asphalt Day
holidays.description: The multi-purpose and incredibly versatile construction material has a fascinating history.

holidays.title: Break The Glass Ceiling Day
holidays.description: It’s time to break the often-invisible systemic barriers that exist to keep women and underrepresented communities from professional advancement.

holidays.title: Bring Flowers To Someone Day
holidays.description: Giving flowers is a wonderful way of expressing your feelings to the people you care about.

holidays.title: Customer Experience Day
holidays.description: Amazing customer experiences deserve a holiday. Celebrate the people and brands that put customers first.

holidays.title: Global Accessibility Awareness Day
holidays.description: Disabled users must have access to the same high-quality digital services and content as non-disabled users.

holidays.title: HG Awareness Day
holidays.description: Observe the day to raise awareness that H.G. is more severe and not just morning sickness.

holidays.title: International Conscientious Objectors Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate conscientious objectors this International Conscientious Objectors Day!

holidays.title: International Family Day
holidays.description: Families—both traditional and non-traditional—are the foundation of society.

holidays.title: International Kangaroo Care Awareness Day
holidays.description: Kangaroo Mother Care is a simple yet effective way for parents to bond with their infants.

holidays.title: MPS Awareness Day
holidays.description: Learn how you can help raise awareness for Mucopolysaccharidoses (M.P.S.) Disorders.

holidays.title: National Aperitif Day
holidays.description: On National Aperitif Day, add a little aperitif to your cocktail and sip it in style!

holidays.title: National Notebook Day
holidays.description: Roses are red, violets are blue, National Notebook Day is here, and we're celebrating with you.

holidays.title: National Nylon Stocking Day
holidays.description: Celebrate this wardrobe essential, which has played an important role in the fashion industry.

holidays.title: National Safety Dose Day
holidays.description: For any illness, taking the proper dose is just as important as taking the right medication.

holidays.title: National Senior Fraud Awareness Day
holidays.description: Join us as we raise awareness about financial fraud on National Senior Fraud Awareness Day.

holidays.title: National Tuberous Sclerosis Day
holidays.description: Join us in raising awareness and eradicating social stigma this National Tuberous Sclerosis Day.

holidays.title: Peace Officers Memorial Day
holidays.description: We’ve put together the best ways to show your appreciation to those who keep the peace.

holidays.title: Straw Hat Day
holidays.description: Panama, boater, or straw fedora, make your fashion statement to celebrate Straw Hat Day.

holidays.title: TSC Global Awareness Day
holidays.description: Tuberous Sclerosis Complex is a genetic disease with symptoms that can range from mild to severe.

holidays.title: Vascular Birthmarks Awareness Day
holidays.description: Most of us are born with birthmarks — and they are mostly harmless.

holidays.title: VBF Day of Awareness
holidays.description: Join us as we observe V.B.F. Day of Awareness this May 15!

holidays.title: Chase Hudson’s Birthday
holidays.description: With over 30 million followers on TikTok, let’s delve into what makes Lil Huddy so admired.

holidays.title: Emmitt Smith’s Birthday
holidays.description: Former football player and one of the greatest running backs in the National Football League.
